import "./card.css" import NFT from "./images/NFT.svg" const Card = ({title, image, floor_price}) => { return (
{title || "Liquid Wave"}
Auction Time
Current Bid
0.05 ETH
3h 1m 50s
{floor_price}
) } export default Card;
